verses.roman:
kibā prārthanā, kibā ājñā--keha nā bujhila
āliṅgana kari' prabhu tāṅre vidāya dila

synonyms: kibā—what; prārthanā—the request; kibā—what; ājnā—the order; keha—anyone; nā bujhila—did not know; āliṅgana kari'-embracing; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—to Him; vidāya dila—bade farewell.
translation: No one knew what Advaita Ācārya requested or what the Lord ordered. After embracing the Ācārya, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu bade Him farewell.
